property.name: fs.gs.auth.client.id
property.description: Client id of Google-managed project associated with the Cloud SDK

property.name: fs.gs.auth.client.secret
property.description: Client secret of Google-managed project associated with the Cloud SDK

property.name: fs.gs.project.id
property.description: This value is required by GCS connector, but not used in the tools provided here. The value provided is actually an invalid project id (starts with `_`).
